customer_dependent_action_data.customer_action: The customer confirms the size/color and provides their address
customer_dependent_action_data.agent_action: The agent asks the customer to confirm the size/color and provide their address before placing the order

customer_dependent_action_data.customer_action: The customer provides information about the occasion or item they are shopping for
customer_dependent_action_data.agent_action: The agent asks what occasion or item the customer is shopping for

customer_dependent_action_data.customer_action: The customer indicates which trending item they want
customer_dependent_action_data.agent_action: The agent lists trending items and asks the customer which one they want

customer_dependent_action_data.customer_action: The customer provides the key information if it was missing.
customer_dependent_action_data.agent_action: The agent calls analyze_query(text=<message>), composes a concise query from normalized_query + entities if intent is in [product_search, outfit_advice, fragrance], calls catalog_search(query=...), presents 3–5 options with brief why & price (INR) if available, and asks one follow-up if key info is missing.

customer_dependent_action_data.customer_action: The customer tells the agent what they’re shopping for or the event they have.
customer_dependent_action_data.agent_action: The agent replies with a brief playful line and asks what the customer is shopping for or the event they have.

customer_dependent_action_data.customer_action: The customer provides information about the venue, dress code, climate, preferred palette, and budget, and picks a lane or tweaks details.
customer_dependent_action_data.agent_action: The agent asks for the venue, dress code, climate, preferred palette, and budget, offers 3 concise outfit directions with explanations, and invites the customer to pick a lane or tweak details.

customer_dependent_action_data.customer_action: The customer provides responses to the clarifying questions and engages with the follow-up question to move the conversation forward.
customer_dependent_action_data.agent_action: The agent calls analyze_query(text=<message>), asks 2–3 short clarifiers if key info is missing, calls catalog_search(query=...), presents 3–5 options with a one-line 'why' and price (INR) if available, and finishes with a single question to move the convo forward.

customer_dependent_action_data.customer_action: The customer responds to the follow-up question or clarifiers, and engages with the options presented.
customer_dependent_action_data.agent_action: The agent calls analyze_query, acknowledges and saves preference if applicable, asks follow-up questions or clarifiers, calls catalog_search, presents options, and finishes with a question.
